name: Lindt EXCELLENCE 70% Cacao Dark Chocolate
comments: 70% cocoa solids from the label. From nutrition facts table: 16g/40g fat => 40% cocoa butter, 12g/40g sugars => 30% sugar (https://www.lindt.ca/en/lindt-excellence-70-cacao-dark-chocolate-bar-100g).

name: Lindt EXCELLENCE 85% Cacao Dark Chocolate
comments: 85% cocoa solids from the label. From nutrition facts table: 18g/40g fat => 45% cocoa butter, 6g/40g sugars => 15% sugar (https://www.lindt.ca/en/lindt-excellence-85-cacao-dark-chocolate-bar-100g).

name: Lindt EXCELLENCE 95% Cacao Dark Chocolate
comments: 95% cocoa solids from the label. From nutrition facts table: 23g/40g fat => 57.5% cocoa butter, 1g/40g sugars => ~3% sugar, other solids 2% by difference (https://www.lindt.ca/en/lindt-excellence-95-cacao-dark-chocolate-bar-80g).

name: Lindt EXCELLENCE 100% Cacao Dark Chocolate
comments: 100% cocoa solids from the label. From the nutrition facts table: 27g/50g fat => 54% cocoa butter, 0g sugars (https://www.lindt.ca/en/lindt-excellence-100-cacao-bar-50g).

name: Ghirardelli 100% Unsweetened Cocoa Powder
comments: 100% cocoa solids from the label. From the nutrition facts table: 1g/6g fat => 16.67% cocoa butter, 0g sugars (https://www.ghirardelli.com/premium-baking-cocoa-100-unsweetened-cocoa-powder-6-bags-61703cs).

name: 60% Dark Chocolate
comments: Generic 60% dark chocolate, standard 55% cocoa butter content assumed (see [STD_COCOA_BUTTER_IN_CACAO_SOLIDS]).
